reference.title: Digital Representation of Cincinnati
reference.description: Prior to this course I had brief experience with digital fabrication with Maya and PowerMill software. I found there is a tremendous possibilities in this manner of design. DAAP has great facility to offer us to explore in digital fabrication, but we didn’t get to exposed to “this part of world” that much earlier, mostly it was occupied by Industrial Design projects.

reference.title: Botanicus Interacticus: Interactive Plant Technology
reference.description: Botanicus Interacticus explores new modes of interaction between humans and living plants by instrumenting them with rich touch and gesture sensitivity.

reference.title: 'Domestic Gubbins'
reference.description: Developing our research from 'Domestic Gubbins', these were a set of smart concept devices designed to embed 'energy autonomy' within the home.

reference.title: AquaMat
reference.description: Potable water drawn from the air

reference.title: Synthetic Nature
reference.description: London-based architect Vlad Tenu’s Synthetic Nature is a collection of prototypes conceived and created through holistic architectural design research into the genesis of form and space, currently on show at Surface Gallery London.

reference.title: the first solar-powered robotic raven takes flight
reference.description: A team of professors and students at the university of maryland have created the first robotic bird that that flies on batteries charged by on board solar cells. ‘robo raven III’ has sufficiently large...
